projects.description: An awesome video player that lets video editors compare multiple takes of a scene at the same time. Drag in as many shots as you want, and the app displays it in a neat grid view. For macOS.
An advanced color management app for iOS and Mac. Use advanced gestures for precise color control on your phone, and see it update live on your Mac app with apps like Sketch, Photoshop, and more.

A simple framework that brings Apple devices together, just like a family. Automatically switches between bluetooth, wifi, and USB to connect and communicate with other Apple devices. For iOS and macOS
There’s plenty more on my GitHub, including a JavaFX animation library, iOS animated UI components, hackathon winning projects, and more. See them at github.com/kirankunigiri
I’ve made projects at several hackathons, including PenApps, Make Hacks, HackingEDU, Angel Hacks, HS Hacks II, and Hack Gen Y. You can see them on my Devpost Page here.
